column2: No neoadjuvant therapy, no treatment before surgery, surgical resection not part of first course of treatment plan; Autopsy only
Neoadjuvant therapy completed according to treatment plan and guidelines
Neoadjuvant therapy started, but not completed OR unknown if completed
Limited systemic exposure when the intent was not neoadjuvant; treatment did not meet the definition of neoadjuvant therapy

Unknown if neoadjuvant therapy performed;
Death Certificate only (DCO)
